Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes

Class PaymentDialog

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.observer.Observable<ClientController>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes.BasicSceneUpdater
it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes.BasicDialog
it.polimi.ingsw.view.scenes.PaymentDialog
public class PaymentDialog extends BasicDialog
allow user to pay a debt by drag and drop resources from storage/chest to payment box
